Invocation Name: cera ve
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CeraVe is committed to providing therapeutic skincare solutions for all. That’s why we designed this skill to support skincare through a variety of features including:
● Product information
● Exclusive offers
● Special messages from Tom Allison, Megan Manco, and the CeraVe Family

CeraVe skill recommendations are meant for informational purposes only and are NOT intended to diagnose, treat or replace the advice or services of your doctor or medical professional. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
priv:
